segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on one leg, grabbing cookies with the other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing right there, waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both so focused on those cookies, they don’t see how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how close that stool is to falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet, and if he slips, he could really get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re going to get in so much trouble if she catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get down before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
